text: [Music]
hi guys I'm Laura Vitale and on this
episode of Laura in the kitchen I'm
gonna show you how I make my popcorn
this is my butter Parmesan popcorn I
always make the make it this way the
ingredients for it are just so simple
and easy you're just gonna need some
popcorn kernals unpopped of course some
unsalted butter that I've melted some
vegetable oil find me John oh no John OH
salt and pepper now growing up we my
mother always made popcorn in a pan but
we never had the microwavable popcorn
number one we did have microwave for so
many years and number two it's just much
much cheaper to make and you can control
whatever seasoning you want on it if you
want more butter if you want less butter
if you want cheese if you want spices
you name it so make sure you get a nice
big pan with a tight-fitting lid and
this is gonna go on to medium heat and
to that I'm gonna add in some vegetable
oil and my popcorn kernel all I'm gonna
do is put the lid on don't open the lid
this is gonna cook for three to four
minutes and you don't want to open up
the lid until the popping starts to slow
down and I'll show you what I mean when
it gets there the popping is just start
to slow down so I'm just gonna turn this
off let it sit for about 60 seconds and
then I'll show you how to finish it
there you go
all right so now it's time to dress it I
need some melted butter always unsalted
cuz I like to salt it myself lack of
salt and pepper and I love popcorn to be
salty and then and then some grated
cheese and it's kind of sort of like
melting it here stick to the popcorn
because of the butter you're not gonna
get this at any bag guarantee it now
just give us a big toss
now you can just immediately smell the
cheese the butter it's heaven right here
we're having gay night so mmm perfect
let's turn over the table we're gonna

give me a wonderful little snack that's
